name: gaRPG2: actually a game this time?
name_original: gaRPG2: actually a game this time?
description:
Gendar is back and in a brand new pile of garbage!

it's kinda a broken thing but I learned quite a bit making it... 
it's also not really finnished! but it not being finnished was stopping me from making things rather than encouraging me to complete it so now it is out there and I can make other shit! 

but yeah it's still kinda busted so save often and rotate your saves. 

have fun I guess I'll try to make somthing where it's less easy to totally break the game soon <3
